title: Apsara Haar: 18K Gold Rice Pearl and Gemstone Necklace
materials: 18 Karat Gold. Features lustrous rice pearls (60.63 cts) and mixed gemstones(NV Stns:20.26(30)
D MQ(+7):-0.25(5)). Shows a brilliant Hyderabadi polish.
features: A floral inspired necklace showcases a blend of modern aesthetic and traditional Haaram design. The necklace features a symmetrical arrangement of rice pearls and color gemstones. Delicately crafted with exceptional detail. The gemstones are bezel-set for enhanced security and beauty. The cluster of rice pearls at the center creates a focal point.
colors: pearl white hues offering a delicate and feminine palette.
occasions: and formal events. Suitable for special occasions like seemantham
or as a stunning statement piece for a modern bride.
description: Exquisite blend of traditional South Indian design with a contemporary touch. Features high-quality rice pearls and gemstones. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring lasting beauty and heirloom quality. Symbolizes prosperity and grace, making it a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection.
